name: RobotVac
0:
”"Alexa, turn on Kenmore Robot vac"”
”"Alexa, turn off Kenmore Robot vac."”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Robot Vac Skill allows you to control your Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum by using Amazon Alexa.
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button above to link your Robot vac account and to discover your Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum product.

If this skill does not respond as expected, please make sure:
1) Robot Vac is online. 
2) You have connected Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum with the Robot vac app. 
3) Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum is still linked to your Robot vac account. 

Compatible products: 
--Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum

Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum works together with Amazon Alexa to keep your home clean.
Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum will clean for up to 1.5 hours and will automatically return to the chargning base.
After connecting Alexa to your RoboVac, just say:
"Alexa, turn on Kenmore Robot vac "
"Alexa, turn off Kenmore Robot vac
Additional : The name of your Smart device , it follows the name you define in your robot vac APP ;and the name can be defined as you want.
Example : you change your smart device name from "kenmore smart robot vac " to " small dog"
START
• "Alexa, turn on small dog"
STOP
• "Alexa, turn off small dog"
